content.html:
Holiday mode is ON! ðŸŽ„

I turned off my work laptop for the last time until January, which means... I'm in Holiday mode!

Of course, I will finalize the last details of my big move during this time. But also, I won't be thinking about work until mid-January. It feels good!

#Holidays #PTO #Vacation #Moving #HolidayModeON
